title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
OB: The synchronization process fails when trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize both the .java file and the other resource in the package viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer.
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
4. Observe that the synchronization fails.
